m_szDocSumamry: Weekly Roundup | Random Chat | Notifications : Sino  012Weekly Roundup | Random Chat | Notificationstext submission (self.Sino)submitted 3 days ago by AutoModerator[M] - announcementNews roundup for the previous week. In International news Meeting with Chinese Premier, Ban commends country’s leadership on UN 2030 Agenda Is racism part of the housing issue? Of course it is: We have cultivated an Us Against Them dynamic—In 1885, we wanted to keep the Chinese out because they were too poor...Now, we want to keep them out because they are too rich It is ‘pure fantasy’ to think diplomatic pressure
